name: ngx-canvas-isomap
description: ngx-canvas-isomap - provides a isometric map that visualizes maps of non-gaming scenarious such as shopfloor or building plans. Calculation behind is rather simple so for gaming scenarious you might consider Unity etc. Currently the isometric map provides functionality like zooming & moving map (mouse & touch), marking & locating tiles (use tag-field), multiple image layers (please consider ordering properly back to front).
author: David Renner
